alert.note: Alert for Comanche (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 1:26PM CDT until March 16 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COMANCHE COUNTY... At 125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Fort Sill, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northern Lawton, Cache, Medicine Park, Fort Sill, Meers, southern Lake Ellsworth, Lake Lawtonka and Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
